title: Manipulate EIP in Immunity Debugger
content:
I just was playing around with Windbg, debugging some application. 
At some point I had to manipulate EIP which was pretty easy in Windbg. But then once I switched back to Immunity, I could not figure out how to do the same thing.

Is there some way you can change the EIP inside Immunity?

answers_data.content: Right click the code, select 'New Origin here' done
Alternatively, you can select an address and press ctrl + * (use the * at the right pad)
